attributes.action: ENSURE CRIMINALS IN PRISON SERVING MORE THAN 4 YEARS SERVE AT LEAST 2 YEARS OF THEIR SENTENCE IN THE ARMY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If a criminal is forced to serve at least 2 years in the armed forces if sentenced to more than 4 years then this would help prevent overcrowding in prisons and lack of people signing up to the armed forces. It would learn the criminal self respect a trade and discipline. this should overall help in the reduction of the crime rates and also be used as a deterrent for peoples to commit the crime in the first place.
Also ensuring they receive payment below or in par with basic minimum pay and the difference could then be used for improvements to the justice system and compensation for third parties.
